product_overview: Onelink is an innovative, serverless link-in-bio tool that stores user data within the URL, enabling users to create and share customized personal landing pages without backend dependencies. It features a responsive interface with live preview and multiple templates catered to various content themes.
core_goals: Enable users to create personalized link-in-bio pages by managing profile, social, and custom links.
Allow users to manage multiple social media links across various platforms easily.
Provide an intuitive drag-and-drop interface for organizing custom links.
Offer a real-time live preview that reflects changes instantly.
Implement URL-based data storage to maintain a serverless, persistent user experience.
Support responsive layout design applicable across device sizes.
Provide a selection of pre-built template data to kickstart user setups.
key_features: Profile Management: users can edit and update their personal profile including name, description, and avatar image.
Social Links Management: users can add, edit, and configure links across multiple social media platforms.
Custom Links Management: users can create, edit, delete, and reorder their custom links with drag-and-drop support.
Live Preview: real-time preview displays the final link-in-bio page view as users make changes.
Demo Data Templates: provision of multiple domain-specific templates such as AI, education, finance, news, productivity, health, and tools for quick setup.
URL-based Data Storage: all user data persists in the URL, enabling a backend-free experience.
Responsive Three-Column Layout: composed of a left-side editing panel and a right-side preview panel, optimized for responsiveness.
Reusable Form Components: modular and reusable form UI components facilitate consistent user input experience.
user_flow_summary: User opens Onelink and is presented with a three-column responsive layout: input forms on the left, live preview on the right.
User fills or edits profile information such as name, description, and avatar.
User manages social media links by adding or modifying URLs for various platforms.
User creates and organizes custom links with options to add, edit, delete, and drag to reorder.
As changes are made, the live preview updates instantly to reflect the final page appearance.
User may choose from multiple demo template data sets to populate initial content quickly.
The complete state of user data is encoded and stored in the URL to enable easy sharing and persistence without server storage.
validation_criteria: Profile information updates are saved and immediately reflected in the live preview.
Social links support multiple platforms and update properly in the preview.
Custom links can be added, edited, deleted, and reordered via drag-and-drop reliably.
Live preview accurately renders the user input and template selections in real time.
URL accurately encodes and preserves all user data including profile, social links, and custom links without data loss.
Responsive layout gracefully adapts to various screen sizes and devices.
Predefined demo templates can be loaded correctly and populate the form fields and preview as expected.
Form components are reusable and function correctly across the application.
